price: TiRẹ̀ ni ohunkóhun tó wà nínú àwọn sánmọ̀, ohunkóhun tó wà nínú ilẹ̀ àti ohunkóhun tó wà láààrin méjèèjì àti ohunkóhun tó wà lábẹ́ ilẹ̀.
arabic: لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَمَا تَحۡتَ ٱلثَّرَىٰ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wamā baynahumā wamā taḥta al-tharā
